effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 1.2 million over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 620,557.

Set: When your Power Word: Shield is completely absorbed on an ally, they are granted Insurance! at 40% effectiveness. Allies with your Insurance! or absorption effects receive 15% increased healing from you.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Cowl of the Woodland Raccoon

spells.description: Use: Deal yourself in, granting you 7,957 to 9,725 Mastery for 15 sec and stacking the deck. Stacking the deck increases the minimum Mastery on future hands by 295 until you leave combat, up to 3 times. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

name: Mug's Moxie Jug

spells.description: Equip: Your spells have a chance to send you into a frenzy, granting you 905 Critical Strike for 15 sec. While frenzied, each spell cast grants an additional 905 Critical Strike but does not refresh the duration. This effect may only occur every 1 sec.

description: The word 'Moxie' is hastily scribbled on.

spells.description:
Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
